flowchart TD
    %% Style and Definitions
    linkStyle default stroke:#333,stroke-width:1.0
    classDef step fill:#ffffff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px,rx:5px,ry:5px

    %% START
    A([Start]):::step --> B{User Logs In?}

    %% LOGIN DECISION
    B -- "Valid" --> C(Access System):::step
    B -- "Invalid" --> B1([Error & Retry]):::step
    B1 --> B

    %% MAIN MENU
    C --> D{Select Action}

    %% ACTIONS
    D -- "Place Order" --> E(Enter Customer & Order Info):::step
    D -- "Update Stock" --> R1(Update Stock & Suppliers):::step
    D -- "Manage Transport" --> R2(Adjust Charges & Surcharges):::step
    D -- "Reports" --> R3(View or Print Reports):::step
    D -- "Manage Users" --> R4(System Admin):::step

    %% RETURN POINTS
    R1 --> D
    R2 --> D
    R3 --> D
    R4 --> D

    %% ORDER FLOW
    E --> F{Check Inventory}
    F -- "Sufficient" --> G(Reserve Items & Reduce Stock):::step
    F -- "Insufficient" --> H(Create Back-Order):::step

    G --> I(Calc Transport Cost):::step
    H --> I

    I --> J(Issue Invoice or Bill):::step

    %% PAYMENT METHODS
    J --> K{Payment Method?}
    K -- "Cash" --> L(Record Cash):::step
    K -- "Cheque" --> M(Record Cheque):::step
    K -- "Card" --> N(Record Card Payment):::step

    %% CHEQUE CLEARANCE
    M --> P{Cheque Clears?}
    P -- "Yes" --> O1{Fully Paid?}
    P -- "No" --> Q(Alternate Payment):::step
    Q --> K

    %% OTHER PAYMENTS
    L --> O1
    N --> O1

    %% ORDER STATUS
    O1 -- "Yes" --> O2(Complete Payment):::step
    O1 -- "No" --> O3(Partial Payment):::step
    O3 --> O2

    %% SHIPPING DECISION
    O2 --> O4{Shipping Needed?}
    O4 -- "Yes" --> O5(Ship Items):::step
    O4 -- "No" --> D

    O5 --> O6{All Items Shipped?}
    O6 -- "Yes" --> O7(Mark Order Complete):::step
    O6 -- "No" --> O8(Pending Back-Order):::step
    O7 --> D
    O8 --> D

    %% END
    D --> Z([End / Logout]):::step

    %% Class assignment for visual consistency
    class A,B,B1,C,D,E,F,G,H,I,J,K,L,M,N,O1,O2,O3,O4,O5,O6,O7,O8,P,Q,R1,R2,R3,R4,Z step

classDiagram

    %% =============== CLASSES ===============
    class User {
        - userID : int
        - username : String
        - password : String
        + login() : bool
    }

    class Role {
        - roleID : int
        - roleName : String
    }

    class Customer {
        - customerID : int
        - name : String
        - address : String
        - contactDetails : String
    }

    class Order {
        - orderID : int
        - orderDate : Date
        - status : String
        + calculateTotal() : double
    }

    class OrderLine {
        - orderLineID : int
        - quantity : int
        - unitPrice : double
        + calcSubTotal() : double
    }

    class Item {
        - itemID : int
        - itemName : String
        - costPrice : double
        - sellingPrice : double
        - currentStock : int
        - reorderThreshold : int
        + updateStock(qty : int) : void
    }

    class Payment {
        - paymentID : int
        - amount : double
        - paymentDate : Date
        - paymentMethod : String
        + processPayment() : void
    }

    class TransportMethod {
        - transportID : int
        - description : String
        - baseRate : double
        - locationSurcharge : double
        + calcTransportCost(location : String) : double
    }

    %% =============== RELATIONSHIPS ===============
    User --> "1" Role : assignedTo
    Customer "1" --> "0..*" Order : places
    Order "1" --> "1..*" OrderLine : has
    OrderLine "1" --> "1" Item : references
    Order "1" --> "0..*" Payment : paidBy
    TransportMethod <-- Order : calculatesShipping (optional link)
